alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 9:22PM PST until January 17 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MONDAY TO 4 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches through Tuesday. West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 55 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 AM Monday to 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick roads and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will rise into Monday morning, then fall during the day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
